message: I'm not living in NRW but I think @arthurk does.
thanks, I am trying to meet a few people who are into django/web app dev here in NRW. thanks for the tip :)
While we are at the topic of german Django devs. Is it just me or is the scene rather small? Are there any blogs, forums, mailinglists or the likes that I'm missing?
The wiki of the German Django Association has a list of all German Django user groups http://djangode.pbworks.com/w/page/4734571/FrontPage
One pyCologne member I know is using convore: @andialbrecht
You can also visit #django-de on freenode to meet german Django users
And there is pyCologne, a large Python user group from Cologne http://wiki.python.de/User%20Group%20K%C3%B6ln You can meet Django people there as well.
Thanks again keimlink, am already aware of the K python group and occasionally lurk in their #irc and am following andialbrecht on twitter :) Ill check out the #django-de channel next :)
@stardog101 we've got Django-related talks (and discussions) in our meetings from time to time.
Well... whenever I stay in Germany (Leverkusen), count me in. But usually I stay in Singapore :)
Thanks guys, I've just recently got my permission to stay in DE so Ill def try to catch up with the python users group in K :)
